text: oya bada ridena ekata nan ithin oyiya pathana waluyi hulu athuyi aken patha patha gane aragena gathu hule gala ambaarala ude hawa bipan..

yaluwa mata kiyanne mama danna ayagen hodata kendara balana kenekuta kiyala aksharayak aran denna kiyala..kawuda me hodata balana aya...ehema kendara karayekgen ahuwanam hoda ganak kapala thawa yanthrath danna oona kiyala thawath ganak kapanawa..mama nodannawada garana garilla..mama mage yaluwage mudalath ithirikarala dunna..daruwata namakuth damma...dan ohu mewa wishwasa karanne na..in passe mama ohuta kiwa mama dunne mata hedayi kiyala hithena akuruyi namuyi kiyala...mithyawata thallu kirima neweyi wadagath eeken galawa ganna ekayi...
oya kalabala kalaye man dawasakata mini dahayak withara kapala thiyenawa.
ee wagema 20,000 adhika minisun pirisak me nirmanayata dayaka wela thiyanawa...
me samaharun sankhyathmakawa kuda pataka pirisak aakarshanaya kara ganna athara kapi penena blog adawiwalata dinakata dahas gananak patakayan paminenawa.
yuddhakara aththe dasanayakage loku thaththaya.
ethana siti wadi dena nada kamin thaththata wuye gnyathi puthrayinya...

1999 wasare di, hamudapathi lesa katayuthu kala parwes musharaf le wagirimakin thorawa sidu kala hamuda kumanthranayata imrange sahaya himiwiya. 2002 maha mathiwaranaye di parlimenthu asunak dina ganimata samath wiya. 2013 wasare maha mathiwaranayen dewani sthanayata path wune imrange nayakathwayen yuth tharik ee insaf pakshayayi.

paswana waraya wuye dayakayan wisin nama niyama kota bhikshunta parithyaga kota ewana siwuru piliganimata anumathiya dimayi.kutakanna sona himiyan aacharyan wahanse gen awasara gena sawathnuwara jethawanaramayata wadamawa buduradun hamuwa wanda awasara gaththa.
apa ihatha pahadili kalak men yamek angampora panthiyakata giya pamanin ‘eya angampora karayek‘ ho ‘eya angampora karanawa‘ yanuwen prakasha kirima gammun samanyayen karana deyaki.
same pahapath bawa athi kirimata hethuwana kola elawalu warga, kaha pahathi palathuru warga, karat yanadiya dinapatha aaharayata ganimen sama pahapath karagatha haki ya.
ee karyaya sandaha wachana bhawitha wuye eetath kalayakata pasuwayi.
nirupana shilpini tharu disanayakage aluthma chayarupa ekathuwak pahathin narambaanna.
ee wathura tikak wadipura biwwath...bonne rata kunu wenna bila nida gena pandara aharila ugura kata welichcha welawata bona wathura tika witharayi.//////////
klarans pamanayi lankawe sitina dolbi sartifayi injiniyar.
telo sanwidhanaye madhyama karaka sabhawa pereda (01) wawniyawedi raswi ema thinduwa gath bawada ohu kiya.
dan kollata fes buk eke hamoma baninawa onna..
issarahata kohomada dewal wenne kiyala janadhipathithuma katha karayi. 106k thiyagena ranil wikramasinha mahaththaya thamange balaya pennuwa.

nawa rajaye adhyapana ha usas adhyapana amathyawaraya lesa path wu aacharya wijedasa rajapaksha mahatha ada(01) perawaruwe isurupaya, adhyapana amathyanshaye di siya amathyadhurayehi wada baraganu labiya.
‘kisiyam lesakin eya kriyathmaka nowuwa hoth ma kumak karannada?’
ira panen karanne.
mema prathikara kramayen rogiyage aayu kalaya wasara kihipayakin ho dirgha kala hakiya.
ee kalaye athi wuna "baminithiyasaya" nam darunu durbhikshayak nisa rahathan wahansela pawa wishala gananak apawath una lu.
widesha katayuthu amathyanshaya
eeth upadhiya karana kalayedi ee iganuma nathara kirimata siduwuna.
loka mathdrawya gataluwa pilibada goliya kriyamargayak sadaha wu wishesha hamuwata da janadhipathithuma sahabhagi wimata niyamithayi.
kantha dewani saha thewani sthana jameyikawata dina dimata kristaniya wiliyams (thath. 11.21) saha gayon ewans (thath. 11.22) samath wuha.
kattiya munu ambaul karagena ha aachchiye kiyala onna aachchiwa nidahas kala.

pasugiya palath sabha mathiwaranayedi pasugiyada ohuge piya wisin wedi thabana lada pushpa kumara mantha්riwaraya galu disthi්rakkaye wadima manapa (52,371) laba ganiddi, manapa 17,920 k labagena palath sabhawata pungbong eke manthi්rawarayek wu mohu, ada apa paksha nayakathwayata kunuharupa kime hakiyawa nisama, jathika mattame deshapalanagnyayek hatiyata ohu golabalakam karana kili raja mahendran godanaga atha.
mama chithra gana lokuwata danne na.
aahara, gamanagamanaya, andum saha anikuth de nipadawimata yodaganna amudrawyayak washayen ashwayin mowun ge diwiya pura bandi pawathiyi.
ewani wishala sahayogayak ekka upawasaya karannage abhimathaya me sahayogaya dakwannange mathayata yata wenawa.
badha kalath rajaya perata yana bawa janapathi awadharanaya karayi | |

[samaharawita chunda ka්ramaya da wiya hakiya] anek athata agamathithumath, janamadhya amathyanshaye pa්rathipaththi sampadakayanuth kalpana kala yuthu wanne deshapalana drushtiyak lesa libaralwadayata wada jathiwadayata minisun adi yanne manda yana karanayayi.

mama awurudu 25 di aapu illimak ahakadanna barikamata migamuwa mahanagara sabawata yu en pi eken chandaya illuwa ,habayi minissu apiwa paraddala ee kalema chande illapu nimal lansalawa dinawala nagara sabawata ariya.kohoma unath mage deshapalana kiyawima me wenakota muhukura gihilla thiyenne,chande illanna gaththa thiranaya hadisi ekak,eeka eda magema watapitawata mawa prakasha karanna gaththa wayamak kiyalayi dan mata hithenne.kohomath me ratata thiyena aadare mage nowenas ekak mage aarthika arbuda hamuwe engalanthaye innawa tharam wikalpa awasthawak mata na.namuth mage rate mage minisun wenuwen karanna puluwan simasahithawa ho karanna mama sudanam.

widesha aayojakayin aakarshanaya karawaganima ha samagamwalata shri lankawa thula idam ayithiya labadima haki karawanu pinisa rate pahadili idam prathipaththiyak pawathiya yuthu bawa ayawaye sandahan we.

eeth mama mathakadi dakka, kopikade ensina, rogathura wela bohoma duk windinawa kiyala.
nudura ma pala karami.
me kiyanna yanne trenin giya mul sathiye ape kattiyata wechcha wada saha ka...
